name: GitHub -- Floating Action Bar
description: Makes the top bar on GitHub float.
additional_info:
0.7 -- Updated for latest redesign, fixed some more Firefox bugs.
0.6 -- Lower z-index, tooltips were being covered by it
0.5 -- Applied z-index to fix it for some CSS changes.
0.4 -- Fixed it for Firefox, and fixed it for new help layout.
0.3 -- Fixed repo homepages. Paddings that were applied to all pages on github.com are now only applied to URLs starting with http://github.com or https://github.com/.
0.2 -- Fixed help.github.com, style is now disabled for it.
0.1 -- Released.
